name: emotionalshell
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: emotional shell
des: Emotional Shell is a prototype application to convey emotions to the user as a response to user interactions. It connects to a Large Language Model (made by OpenAI) able to perform emotion detection (joy, sadness, anger, fear, surprise, disgust) and renders an emotion though Alexa postprocessing of SSML tags.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
